snippet.title: Elsewhere In The Night (PC) - 80's Style Sci-fi Adventure |Longplay - Walkthrough| No Commentary
snippet.description:
Welcome to my - Longplay - Walkthrough - Gameplay - video of Elsewhere In The Night on PC - Windows with no commentary.

You can support my channel here:
► SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/c/NoirStation
► TWITTER: https://twitter.com/Noir_Station
► Leave a tip using Super Thanks!

Elsewhere In The Night is an adventure, point and click video game. Developed and published by Cosmic Void in 2023. The game takes place in a very twisted sci-fi universe, filled with egoistic characters whose only goal is to survive, with our main protagonist not being any different. Named the Lady Tick Tock, she works as a private investigator in this polluted city. But while working on a missing persons case she ends up looking for a serial killer, who is obsessed with people's eyes. 

NoirStation Rating: - 3 Out Of 5 - When I picked up this game I had very low expectations. I thought this would be a very complicated, outdated and boring title. But once I started playing I got intrigued by the weird universe and the story this game was depicting. It’s a very narrative based title and most of the puzzles are easily figurable so you shouldn’t waste time clicking around aimlessly, you can easily enjoy the story.

Video Chapters:
Sky Hotel - 00:00:00
Downtown - 00:22:46
Protest - 00:29:58
Marshes - 00:39:38
Meeting Vindle - 00:46:18
Finale - 01:00:12

This video is recorded, played in my style, and edited by me. Longplay is made as fluid as possible without any deaths, unnecessary menus, loading screens, stumbling around or other non-essential things to a walkthrough. Review and description is written by me as well. All gaming videos on my channel are my original content which I create myself.
